page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: {My Brother's Christening.} Last Sunday I helped Mum make some sandwiches for my brother's Christening. In Church the Vicar read from the Order of Service. When my brother was going to have the water sprinkled on his head the Vicar lifted his head so that the water went back into the font and we all laughed. Then we went home and had lots of things to eat. The guest who came were five friends, four aunties, four cousing and my Nan and Gramp. { {Transport}- By the year 2085 cars will be running on electricity rather than petrol so that engines will be quieter. Roads will be wider with dual carriageways. More hover type vehicles will be in use, skimming above the surface of roads.
